meanings.sent1: I prefer reading softbacks because they are easier to carry around.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a wide selection of softbacks for sale.
meanings.sent3: When the teacher accidentally sat on a pile of softbacks, she ended up with a paper skirt!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library with shelves full of softbacks waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The softbacks on the shelf whispered stories of far-off lands.

meanings.definition: The back part of a person's body that is soft to the touch.
meanings.sent1: He leaned back against the softbacks of the sofa and closed his eyes.
meanings.sent2: The baby's softbacks were warm and comforting against her chest.
meanings.sent3: The kitten curled up on the softbacks of the chair, purring contentedly.
meanings.sent4: Her softbacks ached after a long day of sitting at her desk.
meanings.sent5: The softbacks of the pillow provided a plush landing spot for her head.
